程序包 dev.csu.survivor.component.base

类 AttackComponent

java.lang.Object
com.almasb.fxgl.entity.component.Component
dev.csu.survivor.component.base.AttackComponent
直接已知子类:
MeleeAttackComponent, RangedAttackComponent
public abstract class AttackComponent extends com.almasb.fxgl.entity.component.Component
控制实体攻击的抽象组件 继承并实现 doAttack 方法以实现实体特定的攻击逻辑

依赖的组件: StateComponent
